casebody.data:
PITTSBORO MATTERS, INC., George A. Robertson, J. Turner Whitted, Christopher M. Watkins, Ducka Kelly, and Greg Ogle
v.
TOWN OF PITTSBORO
v.
Chatham Park Investors, LLC, Intervenor No. 312P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Daniel Taylor, Jr., Attorney at Law, Chris W. Haaf, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Lacy H. Reaves, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Chatham Park Investors, LLC. J. Mitchell Armbruster, Attorney at Law, Raleigh. Robert E. Hornik, Jr., Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Pittsboro Matters, Inc., et al. G. Nicholas Herman, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill. Paul S. Messick, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Town of Pittsboro.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of August 2016 by Intervenor in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
